CustomField.formula: IF( Opportunity__r.Total_Assets__c <= 5000000, 3025, IF( AND( Opportunity__r.Total_Assets__c > 5000000, Opportunity__r.Total_Assets__c <= 10000000), 3782 , IF( AND( Opportunity__r.Total_Assets__c > 10000000, Opportunity__r.Total_Assets__c <= 25000000), 4538, IF ( AND ( Opportunity__r.Total_Assets__c > 25000000, Opportunity__r.Total_Assets__c <= 100000000), 6807, IF ( AND ( Opportunity__r.Total_Assets__c > 100000000, Opportunity__r.Total_Assets__c <= 250000000), 11344, IF ( Opportunity__r.Total_Assets__c > 250000000, (13750 + (((Opportunity__r.Total_Assets__c-250000000) / 20000000)*1000)), 0 ))))))
CustomField.label: D&O Base Rate
